com.artemis

Interface EntityObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AspectSubscriptionManager, ComponentManager, EntityManager, GroupManager, Manager, PlayerManager, TagManager, TeamManager, UuidEntityManager

    public interface EntityObserver
    EntityObservers are invoked when an entity is created, changes composition id or is deleted. At the moment, only implement this interface.

    The EntitySubscription.SubscriptionListener while similar, should not be confused with this interface, as only report entities inserted or removed when matched against EntitySubscription

    Author:
    Arni Arent
